messages.title: Share and discover what’s on TV.
messages.page.vision.title: Our Vision
messages.page.vision.headline: Making TV and streaming discoverable and shareable.
messages.page.vision.emphasize: Sharing and discovering of TV or streaming moments should be easy, fun and free!
messages.page.vision.text: We realized this to be a real need of people who share photos of TV screens and clunky recordings in social media. We give people a better experience and provide broadcasters new opportunities to interact with them.
messages.page.solution.title: Our Solution
messages.page.solution.headline: Let viewers discover and share moments of TV.
messages.page.business.title: For Broadcasters of linear TV and streaming
messages.page.business.headline: A new way to reach viewers and fans.
messages.page.faq.title: Frequently asked questions.
messages.page.contact.title: Get in touch
messages.page.contact.headline: Your bright future starts with a simple conversation.
messages.page.contact.emphasize: Whether you are curious how Snapscreen works with you,
messages.page.contact.text: or you’d like to know your growth content potential, we’d love to chat with you.
messages.page.try.title: Demo to try Snapscreen
messages.page.try.headline: Try it now
messages.page.press.title: Press
messages.page.press.headline: Press mentions and updates along our journey.
messages.page.notfound.title: Sorry, not found
messages.page.notfound.description: We are great in detecting TV and streaming contents. Obviously not so in our own website contents.
messages.block.supportedBy.title: We are supported and trusted by
messages.block.giveFeedback.title: Give us Feedback!
messages.block.giveFeedback.text: Let us know how our product could help You in your business. What do you expect, miss or suggest? Please share Your thoughts with us.
messages.block.team.text: highly skilled futurists finding new solutions for real problems.
messages.team.willo.name: Thomas Willomitzer
messages.team.willo.about: Previously co-founder of Last.FM and former CTO of Jumio. With proven ability to shape strategy, lead large teams, drive innovation and ultimately increase market share in a highly competitive international environment.
messages.team.matthias.name: Matthias Grieder
messages.team.matthias.about: Matthias has a 20 years background in design and business development. He understands context by observation, listening and curiosity to find solutions and integrate the best idea. He got a proven ability to lead and manage a wide variety of design and development projects in team and independent situations.
messages.team.markus.name: Markus Rumler
messages.team.markus.about: Internet Entrepreneur, Co-founder and CMO at 42.cx Center of Excellence for Artificial Intelligence AG, previously founding member and CCO at Jumio.Inc and head of PR at Jajah.com. Markus brings in 20+ years of experience and is leading the marketing strategy of Snapscreen.
messages.team.dmitry.name: Dmitry Nikolaev
